about_the_game:
A super gritty outfit pack about cars and stuff. You've heard of Transformers, right? Well, these are cooler.

Every party member gets a new outfit.

ALL PROFITS GO TO DESERT BUS FOR HOPE.

Desert Bus for Hope is an organized donation drive that benefits Child's Play, a charity that donates equipment and toys to children's hospitals around the globe.

To switch outfits:


- Go to the specified characters room on your ship
- Select the Switch Outfits options
- Click on Pocket Universe
- Click on Desert Bus
